item.myths_and_legends.adamant_orb.descr: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves.
item.myths_and_legends.aurora_ticket.des: A ticket required to board the ship to Birth Island.
item.myths_and_legends.azure_flute.descr: A flute that emits a clear tone that summons Arceus to the Sinjoh Ruins.
item.myths_and_legends.blue_orb.descript: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
item.myths_and_legends.bonus_disk.descri: A mysterious disk with unknown content.
item.myths_and_legends.clear_bell.descri: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing.
item.myths_and_legends.dna_splicer.descr: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon together.
item.myths_and_legends.eon_ticket.descri: A ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island.
item.myths_and_legends.griseous_orb.desc: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.
item.myths_and_legends.gs_ball.descripti: A mysterious Poké Ball. It has something to do with the Mythical Pokémon Celebi.
item.myths_and_legends.jade_orb.descript: A shiny green orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Johto region.
item.myths_and_legends.liberty_pass.desc: A pass to go to Liberty Garden. Board the ship in Castelia City.
item.myths_and_legends.lustrous_orb.desc: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves.
item.myths_and_legends.member_card.descr: An odd card which is needed to enter the Inn in Canalave City.
item.myths_and_legends.oaks_letter.descr: A letter from Professor Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Route 224.
item.myths_and_legends.old_sea_map.descr: A chart that can be used to navigate to Faraway Island, where Mew is said to reside.
item.myths_and_legends.red_orb.descripti: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
item.myths_and_legends.rusted_shield.des: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.
item.myths_and_legends.rusted_sword.desc: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.
item.myths_and_legends.tidal_bell.descri: A bell capable of summoning Lugia from the depths of the Whirl Islands when rung.
item.myths_and_legends.dr_fujis_diary.de: Dr. Fuji's diary, filled with records of his research on Mew and the resulting creation of Mewtwo.
item.myths_and_legends.rainbow_wing.desc: A strange feather that gleams in rainbow colors.
item.myths_and_legends.scarlet_book.desc: A record of the expedition that the author, Heath, went on within the Great Crater of Paldea. The book has the name “Sada” written on it in clumsy handwriting.
item.myths_and_legends.silver_wing.descr: A strange feather that gleams with a silvery color.
item.myths_and_legends.violet_book.descr: A record of the expedition that the author, Heath, went on within the Great Crater of Paldea. The book has the name “Turo” written on it in clumsy handwriting.
item.myths_and_legends.cocoon_of_destruc: A mysterious item that holds the power of destruction.
item.myths_and_legends.sapling_of_life.d: A magical sapling embodying the essence of life.
item.myths_and_legends.zygarde_cube.desc: An item in which Zygarde Cores and Cells are gathered.
item.myths_and_legends.mystery_box.descr: A box that seems to attract a certain mysterious Pokémon.
item.myths_and_legends.reveal_glass.desc: A looking glass that reveals the true nature of the Therian Forces of Nature.
item.myths_and_legends.dark_stone.descri: A stone filled with dark, powerful energy, linked to the Legendary Pokémon Zekrom.
item.myths_and_legends.light_stone.descr: A stone radiating a pure light, connected to the Legendary Pokémon Reshiram.
item.myths_and_legends.teal_mask.descrip: A mysterious mask associated with the Pokémon Ogerpon, radiating a soft, teal glow.
item.myths_and_legends.sun_flute.descrip: A flute that glows with the light of the sun, capable of summoning Solgaleo.
item.myths_and_legends.moon_flute.descri: A flute that shines with the light of the moon, used to call upon Lunala.
item.myths_and_legends.lunar_feather.des: A feather that glows with a gentle lunar light, connected to the Legendary Pokémon Cresselia.
item.myths_and_legends.magma_stone.descr: A stone that holds intense heat, tied to the Legendary Pokémon Heatran.
